name: Micro Precision Unlimited
description: Micro Precision Unlimited (MPU) is a leading provider of precision measurement solutions and advanced technology services. Founded in 1995, the company specializes in delivering high-quality metrology equipment and calibration services to a variety of industries including aerospace, automotive, defense, and healthcare. MPU is committed to ensuring the accuracy and reliability of measurements through its state-of-the-art technologies and a team of skilled professionals. The company's product portfolio includes an extensive range of precision instruments, including coordinate measuring machines (CMMs), optical comparators, and handheld measurement devices. MPU also offers tailored calibration services to help clients maintain compliance with industry standards and regulations. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, MPU invests significantly in research and development to enhance its offerings and stay at the forefront of the metrology sector. The company’s mission is to empower businesses by providing them with the tools and knowledge necessary to achieve precise measurements, ultimately improving their operational efficiency and product quality.

seo.meta_title: Micro Precision Unlimited | Precision Measurement Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Micro Precision Unlimited, a leader in precision measurement solutions and calibration services. Discover our innovative products and commitment to accuracy.

faq.question: What does Micro Precision Unlimited specialize in?
faq.answer: Micro Precision Unlimited specializes in precision measurement solutions and calibration services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Micro Precision Unlimited?
faq.answer: Sarah Johnson is the CEO of Micro Precision Unlimited.

faq.question: Where is Micro Precision Unlimited headquartered?
faq.answer: Micro Precision Unlimited is headquartered in Huntsville, Alabama, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by MPU?
faq.answer: MPU offers precision instruments such as CMMs and optical comparators, along with calibration services.

faq.question: When was Micro Precision Unlimited founded?
faq.answer: Micro Precision Unlimited was founded in 1995.
